title: Sniper: Reloaded
writer: Michael Frost Beckner, Crash Leyland, John Fasano
short_cast: Chad Michael Collins, Richard Sammel, Annabel Wright, Justin Strydom, Billy Zane, Hlomla Dandala, Conrad Kemp, Kayla Privett, Clyde Berning, Rob Fruithof, Martin Le Maitre, Patrick Lyster, Ian Van Der Heyden
cast: Chad Michael Collins, Richard Sammel, Annabel Wright, Justin Strydom, Billy Zane, Hlomla Dandala, Conrad Kemp, Kayla Privett, Clyde Berning, Rob Fruithof, Martin Le Maitre, Patrick Lyster, Ian Van Der Heyden

desc: Following in the footsteps of his father, a Marine takes on a deadly mission to rescue a Belgian farmer from hostilities in the Congo.
